title: Itoshi No Hige Otome-Chan
alternative_title: いとしの髭乙女ちゃん ; My Dear Bearded Maiden
status: いとしの髭乙女ちゃん ; My Dear Bearded Maiden
description:
Description :
        From Blissful Sin:

Single guy Soushi and divorcee Atsumu find themselves living together due to a mix-up by their landlady. Despite being complete strangers, they end up getting along, and soon Soushi realizes that he?s falling for Atsumu. But Atsumu seems to already be in a relationship?
